## hpr3283 :: HPR RPG Club reviews Dead Earth

 
Klaatu, Beni, and Mcnalu review the tabletop RPG game Dead Earth, a game published under the GNU Free Documentation License (GFDL).


Next up is Starfinder, a space-themed game using the 3.5 edition D&D rules.
If you're interested in playing, join the Hacker Public Radio mailing list or email Klaatu at this domain.
